Header: New Chairman of National Youth Services Council assumes office
Content: New Chairman of the National Youth Services Council Attorney Kanishka Suranimala Rajapaksa has said that his prime aim is to groom a youth generation that could provide leadership to the country through self-capabilities and strength. He expressed this view assuming duties at the Maharagama National Youth Services Centre. He assumed office amidst religious observances. Kanishka Suranimala Rajapaksa who is an Attorney by profession had also served as a member of the Board of Directors of the National Youth Services Council. He is the son of the Late Suranimala Rajapaksa who was a former Minister. A group including his family members joined in the occasion.
